original_title: 日本女侠伝  侠客芸者
overview: Popular geisha Shinji (Fuji Junko) must defy a gang who plot to steal a lucrative coal  business from struggling miners during the turbulent Meiji Era. With a stellar all-star  cast, thrilling story and Takakura Ken's violent swordplay, makes this into a classic  Yakuza movie!
title: Samurai Geisha
